mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.email, u.nickname, u.profile_image AS profileImage, u.created_at, a.agree AS alarmAgree FROM users u LEFT JOIN alarm a ON u.user_id = a.users_user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT password FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET nickname = #{nickname}, profile_image = #{profileImage}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE users SET password = #{encodedPassword}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE alarm SET agree = #{agree} WHERE users_user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE users SET status = 0, nickname = CONCAT('탈퇴한 사용자#', user_id), profile_image = NULL WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE users SET password = #{encodedPassword}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE email = #{email}
